Header.title: Train. Lift. Grow.
Header.paragraph: Strength comes from lifting yourself up when you needed it the most

paragraph1: In October of 2019 Gabriel & Gaby became certified personal trainers through NASM. They began their journey at Fitness 19 where they help achieved their clients goals. However, in March of 2020 the pandemic shut down all gyms where they both decided to continue their training, but at their home gym.
paragraph2: It was there where they both continued their success in personal training. Their popularity grew & it was time to take the next step. Gabriel wanted to expand the business to Self Made Training Facility where he would continue to grow & Gaby would have control over the home gym. Z FIT has two locations, Yorba Linda & Orange. Gaby trains clients in Yorba Linda & Gabriel trains clients in Orange.

Team.name: Gabriel Zapata
Team.mission: Gabriel is a certified personal trainer through NASM (National Academy of Sports Medicine). He has a bachelors degree in Kinesiology, specializing in strength & conditioning. He has been training athletes since 2019.

Team.name: Gaby Zapata
Team.mission: Gaby is a certified personal trainer through NASM. She is a seasoned veteran in personal training with 20 plus years of experience. Originally she was an architect, but became a stay at home mom taking care of her 4 kids including Gabriel.
